about_the_game:
WarOfGods Athena is 3D RPG Metaverse game using Voice recognition. User can talk with NPC for mission or play game by voice commands for various avatar's actions. This game is based on Greek Mythology. First Main avatar is Athena, goddess of war. User have to find the gods and goddess disappeared suddenly. If user would find the gods and goddess, the god or goddess will be user's next avatar.
This is the open world game and the world consists of 8 regions. Spring, summer, autumn, winter, desert, volcano, underworld, heaven.
User can enjoy various quest and fight with various bosses. Job is three kind of jobs. Every job has 20 weapons and every weapon has it's skill.
Users can play the game with voice commands. Various Greek gods and monsters appear in this game. Weapons are almost always 100% combined, and there is no draw. It was non-targeting, and I did full dubbing. Portals can be used to move between regions, and players can fly if they gain wings.

User can use voice commands of 30 minutes for mission. Use of voice is optional. Voices are helpful when talking to each gatekeeper to enter the four seasons.
Surely User can carry out the mission and play game without voice commands.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has no sexual scenes, but the occasional swimsuit-level costumes and attacks on fantasy creatures may not be suitable for children.
